sentences.en: "Prices are down 40 per cent since Christmas," he lamented.
sentences.cn: “圣诞节以来物价降了4成，”他悲叹道。

sentences.en: A young man came hurrying down the street.
sentences.cn: . 一个年轻人急匆匆地沿着街道走来。

sentences.en: David bent down to tie his shoelace.
sentences.cn: 戴维弯腰系鞋带。

sentences.en: Get down off the table.
sentences.cn: 从桌子上下来。

sentences.en: Glancing down the list of runners, I noticed a familiar name.
sentences.cn: 我往下扫了一眼赛跑选手的名单，注意到了一个熟悉的名字。

sentences.en: he claimed his problems were down to the media.
sentences.cn: 他声称自己的问题是传媒引起的。

sentences.en: He closed down the business and went into politics.
sentences.cn: 他关闭公司投身政治。

sentences.en: He struggled to hold the bike down on the banked corners.
sentences.cn: 拐过斜弯时他竭力将自行车把稳。

sentences.en: He was knocked down by an uppercut from Eubank.
sentences.cn: 他被尤班克一记上钩拳击倒在地。

sentences.en: Her hair came down to her waist.
sentences.cn: 她的头发一直垂到腰际。

sentences.en: High winds have knocked down trees and power lines.
sentences.cn: 大风刮倒了树木和电线。

sentences.en: House prices have come down in recent months.
sentences.cn: 最近几个月房价降下来了。

sentences.en: I never had Jake down as a ladies' man.
sentences.cn: 我从来不认为杰克是讨女人喜欢的人。

sentences.en: I saw her push the boulder down on you.
sentences.cn: 我看见她将巨石推下砸向你。

sentences.en: I wasn't successful, so they looked down on me.
sentences.cn: 我一无所成，所以他们瞧不起我。

sentences.en: I went down on my knees and prayed for guidance.
sentences.cn: 我跪了下来，祈求得到指引。

sentences.en: I went down town to do a few errands.
sentences.cn: 我去市中心办了几件事。

sentences.en: I'm down to my last few pounds.
sentences.cn: 我仅剩最后几英镑了。

sentences.en: Just play it safe, cover your ass, keep your head down.
sentences.cn: 要谨慎行事，保护好自己并保持低调。

sentences.en: Keep your speed down.
sentences.cn: 速度放慢。

sentences.en: Keep your spending on luxuries down to manageable proportions.
sentences.cn: 将你在奢侈品上的花费降至可控范围。

sentences.en: Ken fell asleep face down (= with his face towards the ground ) on the couch.
sentences.cn: 肯趴在长沙发上睡着了。

sentences.en: One of the office girls was down with the flu.
sentences.cn: 一位女职员得了流感。

sentences.en: Only two go down at the end of this season.
sentences.cn: 本赛季末只有两支队伍降级。

sentences.en: Physical and ideological barriers had come down in Eastern Europe.
sentences.cn: 物质和意识形态上的障碍在东欧已不复存在。

sentences.en: She dusted herself down and left to build her own career.
sentences.cn: 她重振旗鼓去开创自己的事业了。

sentences.en: She stood on a balcony looking down into the courtyard.
sentences.cn: 她站在阳台上朝下面的院子望去。

sentences.en: Tears were streaming down my face.
sentences.cn: 我泪流满面。

sentences.en: The bathroom is down those stairs.
sentences.cn: 浴室在那段楼梯下面。

sentences.en: The sun was going down and it would soon be dark.
sentences.cn: 夕阳西下，天很快就要黑了。

sentences.en: the union instructed its members to down tools.
sentences.cn: 工会指示其成员停工。

sentences.en: They came running down the stairs.
sentences.cn: 他们跑下楼来。

sentences.en: Try to support each other when one of you is feeling down.
sentences.cn: 当有人觉得情绪低落时，要努力相互打气。

sentences.en: Turn the radio down.
sentences.cn: 把收音机的音量调低。

sentences.en: was down on jogging after his injury.
sentences.cn: 他受伤之后就不喜欢漫步了

sentences.en: We heard the sound of laughter down below.
sentences.cn: 我们听到下面有笑声。

words.tran_cn: 柔和的；绒毛的；多丘岗的
软毛，[植]绒毛；[地质]开阔的高地

phrases.tran_cn: (股票市场上) 与…相比下跌
贫困潦倒的；被击倒不能再战的

phrases.phrase: down in the mouth 或 down at the mouth
phrases.tran_cn: 垂头丧气的；悲伤的；沮丧的
【非正式用语】 憎恶或敌对；不喜欢
不走运地，穷困潦倒地：由于不幸而遭受厄运的折磨
彻底地，完全；在一切方面
等到最后一刻才开始做事，最后关头
(英，非正式)停工（尤指作为一种劳工抗议）
[澳大利亚、新西兰英语](尤指在不需要的时候或抢在别人前面)获得某物
下降；平静下来；传下去；被接受
把某人请来作客(从城市到农村，从河流上游到下游，从北到南等用 down，反之 用 up)

trans.tran_cn: 往下，(坐)下，下跌，从上至下，向南方，失去钱，预付，到某地
trans.tran_en: to or towards a lower place or position
at or towards a level or amount that is less

trans.tran_cn: 往…的下端，在…下方，沿着，贯穿

trans.tran_en: used to say that you strongly oppose a government, leader etc and want them to lose their power
